title: Wishing for a Parallel World
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00C3MJP0YWishing for a Parallel World is the story of a world and a world beyond... a parallel world.On one side, these famous and well known Hollywood celebrities are living in the constant limelight of fame, rumors, life behind the silverscreen leaving them struggling between reel and real life. On the other side, these six best friends are living an extraordinary life, peacefully and happily away from this limelight in a Parallel World.Book Journey starts with Meera who belongs to Parallel World, comes to earth one day and finds a diary in the Yosemite Valley in which she finds the words written as “Wishing for a Parallel world”.Her inquisitive nature makes her want to find this person who wishes to be a part of her world as she feels the vibes of helplessness in those words. Her friends who are very protective of her deny helping. However, destiny leads them on the path of Los Angeles and they meet with an accident encountering Hollywood Celebrities (Adam Woods, Tedd Bueno, Austin Pears, Emily Rose etc) and then the journey of New Friendship, Love and Hatred begins.Will Meera ever find who wrote those words in that diary?What is the reality of the parallel world?Will friends remain forever?Will love find its way back to love?Discover...
author: Arriah Kiprujistho
